title: x/build/cmd/release: freebsd-386 build fails
body:
```
2015/07/17 14:00:23 freebsd-386: Error: go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/godoc golang.org/x/tour/gotour: exit status 1
go install: cannot install cross-compiled binaries when GOBIN is set
```

Strange that it fails here but nowhere else.

Aside: does anyone care?
